parameters: \n<F>Don't look at that door...No one will come...
Choking to death. Just as I did.
\n<F>Do you hate me cause I left you?...
\n<F>Oh... Then why are you hiding instead of telling
\n<F>I'll give you a clue. That's the same thing that kept
you from reaching Liam after Aarons's death...
\n<F>Are you expecting your mother to forget about her beloved
son and to simply... move on?...
\n<F>So... As I said... We are the same...
Despite all you did... I... still loved you...
And I hated myself for that...
Because, how can you love someone who...
But then, Dr. White told me that, perhaps,
you did it out of love...
And suddenly... I saw a person who I can relate
to... and who I could love...
There were bad memories... but also good ones...
I must give myself and others...
